items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the onImportEnded member of the bookmarks Web Extensions interface. The data comes from a commit in the browser's source code, mapped to a version number using available tooling or via the commit timestamp.

Commit: https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/dc0412127385b73df3647ebfb313b61e51ef1496

Bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1477271
Target Milestone: mozilla63
items.title: Update Firefox data for optional_permissions Web Extensions manifest

items.content_html:
Summary

The link on https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FedCM_API#specifications was leading to a 404

FedCM spec advanced from CG to WG, which published a First Public Working Draft.
items.title: fix: FedCM spec_url

items.content_html:
FF131 supports text fragments in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1914877

This updates the features for each of the affected interfaces.
Note, I also added "web-features:target-text" to some of the cases where it was missing, and marked the FragmentDirective and Document.fragmentDirective as no longer experimental.

Related docs work can be tracked in mdn/content#35703
items.title: Ff131 text fragments
